Title: Dagra the Fierce
Description:
Der be another trainer not far from here that you ought to fight to test your worth.

Dagra the Fierce waits on the northern slope of Thorn Hill, east of The Crossroads. If you be beatin' her, you just might have what it takes.
ObjectivesText: Defeat Dagra the Fierce in a pet battle.
CompletionText: I fear nothing. I will not be defeated!
RewardText: You fight with the determination of one who does not fear defeat, but does not tolerate it, either. You will go far.
